body.p:
Louisville Ky Dec 16 1865
Gov Bramlete
Sir
There is in Louisville at this time Between Twenty and Twenty five men Part of whom formerly Belonged to your old Regt. The 3rd who want me to Raise a Company in the State service
I write to you for Permission to arm and Equip these men, and Permit them to go to Pulaskin County in this State With me And I will ensure that I sware a full company in Six weeks
I was 1st Lieut= of Co A 10th Ky infantry Resigned in Disability
Col Hays was late commander advised me to write to you Personally
I can ^(give)^ any Refferance necessary and Hopeing That you will give me a favorable answer

I Remain your most
Obt Servt
Jas Reynolds

Louisville Ky
Dec 16" 1864
Reynolds Jas.
formerly 1" Lt Co. A. 10" Ky I.
To The Gov-
Desires permission to raise a Co. for state service-
Issue authority for company State troops 12 months service

D W Lindsey
Insp & Adj Genl
Dec 18. 1864
30 w 30
Recd A. G. O. Dec 19" 1864
